btv.download

Class DLManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • btv.download.DLManager

  • public class DLManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The main interface to the BTV API. This class handles adding Torrents , removing Torrents, pausing and stopping Torrents. It also handles adding the event listeners to Torrents

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DLManager()
      Constructor to set up a new download manager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DLManager

        public DLManager()
        Constructor to set up a new download manager.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public java.lang.String add(java.lang.String fileName)
        Add a new Torrent to the download manager.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the meta-info file of the Torrent.
        Returns:
        The name of the Torrent which can be used to start, stop, pause and remove the Torrent. It can also be used to add listeners to the torrent.

      • start

        public void start(java.lang.String name)
        Start the torrent with name downloading.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Torrent to start.

      • pause

        public void pause(java.lang.String name)
        Pauses an actively downloading Torrent. When a Torrent is paused it will attempt to retain it's active Peer connections while not downloading the file. It retains Peer connections by periodically sending keep alive messages to the peers.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Torrent to pause.

      • stop

        public void stop(java.lang.String name)
        Stops an actively downloading Torrent. Stopping a Torrent will close all of it's connections to it's Peers. The Torrent will still be kept in the list of downloads.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Torrent to stop

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String name)
        Remove a Torrent from the list of downloads. If the Torrent is actively downloading it will first be stopped and then removed.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Torrent to remove.
        See Also:
        stop(String)

      • get

        public Torrent get(java.lang.String name)
        Get the Torrent associated with with associated name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Torrent to get.
        See Also:
        Torrent

      • downloadsFinished

        public boolean downloadsFinished()
        Check if all downloads have finished.
        Returns:
        True if every Torrent has finished downloading, false otherwise.

      • getConnections

        public java.util.ArrayList<Peer> getConnections(java.lang.String name)
        Get a list of the Peers the Torrent with name is currently connected to.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Torrent to get the list of Peers from.
        See Also:
        Peer

      • addTorrentListener

        public void addTorrentListener(TorrentListener t,
                      java.lang.String name)
        Add a TorrentListener to the Torrent with name
        Parameters:
        t - The TorrentListener to add to the Torrent
        name - The name of the Torrent to add t to.
        See Also:
        TorrentListener

                             java.lang.String name)
